message: You're on the right track. Just keep going.
Everything is working as expected. Enjoy the moment.
Today is a good day to build something new.
You've been acknowledged. Processing... eventually.
Silence can be meaningful too.
A chapter in your life has closed. Embrace the new path.
The answer might lie elsewhere. Be flexible.
Sometimes you need to take a detour to find the right path.
No need to change. You're already enough today.
Maybe it's time to rethink how you're asking.
Believe in your worth - and don't forget your credentials.
Sometimes you need to invest in yourself.
Just because you can see it, doesn't mean it's yours today.
Maybe today isn't the day to look for answers.
Sometimes you need to try a different approach.
Your standards are high, and that's okay.
Don't take things too seriously. Be playful.
Slow down. The universe needs time to catch up.
Not everything is your fault. Some bugs live deeper.
Sometimes, even your sources can be unreliable.
It's okay to take a break. Reboot and return stronger.
Some things just take longer. Patience is your ally.
Even an infinite loop deserves a break.
Endless effort doesn't always mean progress.
Sometimes, the best move is to walk away.
You may feel stuck, but maybe you're just in a very long loop.
The future is full of promises... and debt.
Acknowledging the problem is the first step. The second is... someday.
Shortcuts often lead to scenic detours later.
Improvement starts with intent - and a deadline.
Don't forget why you started.
Some mysteries are better documented.
Great ideas take time - and sometimes a nap.
You may not know the question, but the answer feels right.
Every false has the potential to flip.
Sometimes, you just haven't gotten your answer yet.
It's okay to break - just catch yourself after.
You're ready to handle whatever comes... or ignore it completely.
Sometimes you need to let go... but maybe not everything.
Sometimes, the only way forward is to step back.
New branches are where the magic happens.
Look closely. Even the hidden things matter.
You'll always find what you're looking for - if you know how to search.
A clean end is a beautiful thing.
You knew better. But not soon enough.
A quick fix today might haunt you tomorrow.
Clean slates are powerful - and dangerous.

snippet: git commit -m "final final v2 REALLY final"
message: Some things are never truly finished.
Maybe what you trusted... wasn't really there.
Even the smallest misstep can derail the best intentions.
Without purpose, nothing begins.

snippet: IndexError: list index out of range
message: You reached too far. Perhaps it's time to reconsider your boundaries.
You can't always combine the things you want to.
Some doors won't open - not yet.
Not everyone is ready to connect. Try again later.
You might be looking too far. Start closer to home.
Sometimes, pushing past your limits leads to new inspiration.
Even the best of us lose control sometimes.
You might be in the wrong place... or not initialized yet.
Your reality is not universal.

snippet: "Try turning it off and on again."
message: Sometimes, a reset is all you really need.
You might need to level up before proceeding.

snippet: ENOENT(2) - No such file or directory
message: Sometimes, you just need to create your own path.
Stop chasing ghosts.
Sometimes, you just need to take a break.
Not everything that fails is your fault.

snippet: ENXIO(6) - No such device or address
message: Maybe you're knocking on the wrong door.
Keep it simple. Even the kernel thinks so.
Patience is part of progress.
You've been thinking too much. Time to rest.
It's not always the right time - or the right key.

snippet: ENOSPC(28) - No space left on device
message: You may need to let go before you can move on.
What makes sense to you might not compute elsewhere.
You got hit by something big. Recovery takes time.
Something deep inside needs attention.
